source_sentence: 拔一切業障根本得生淨土神呪
translation: Dhāraṇī for removing the root of all karmic hindrances and gaining birth in the Pure Land

source_sentence: (出小無量壽經)
translation: (From the Xiao wuliangshou jing)

source_sentence: 劉宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅
translation: Liu Song Tianzang Sanzang Kunabhadra

source_sentence: 奉　詔重譯
translation: retranslated according to the imperial edict

source_sentence: 南無阿彌多婆夜哆(多曷切)(一)　他伽哆(都餓切)(二)　夜哆地(途賣切)(三)　夜他阿彌利(上聲)(四)　都婆毘(五)　阿彌利哆(六)　悉眈婆毘(七)　阿彌利哆(八)　毘迦蘭諦(九)　阿彌利哆(十)　毘迦蘭哆(十一)　伽彌膩(十二)　伽伽那(十三)　枳多迦隷(十四)　莎婆訶(十五)若有善男子善女人能誦此呪者，阿彌陀佛常住其頂，日夜擁護，無令怨家而得其便，現世常得安隱，臨命終時任運往生。
translation: Āmitâbhaya-dhātu(tāhāche)(i) Tagatha(tuhāche)(ii) Yathāgata(tuvāche)(iii) Yathāgata-Amṛta(supra)(iv) Dravya(v) Amitâbha(vi) Sthavira(vii) Amitâbhaya(viii) Vikarandhī(ix) Amitâbhaya(x) Vikarandhī(xi) Gamini(xii) Gagana(xiii) Ketakalpa(xiv) Sthavahā(xv) If any good man or woman can recite this dhāraṇī, Amitâbha will always remain on his or her head, guard him or her day and night, prevent enemies from getting an advantage over him or her, always attain peace in the present life, and be reborn at will when his or her life ends.

source_sentence: ◎◎阿彌陀經不思議神力傳(附隋錄，未詳作者)：昔長安僧叡法師、慧崇、僧顯、慧通，近至後周實禪師、景禪師、西河鸞法師等數百餘人，並生西方。
translation: Amitâbha Sutra of Inconceivable Powers (with Sui Catalogue, unknown author): In the past, more than a hundred people were born in the West, including the Chan'an monk Ei Fashi, Sengsung, Sengshien, and Huitong, and more recently, the Latter Zhou real Chan Shi, Jing Chan Shi, and Xiheluan Fashi.

source_sentence: 西河綽禪師等，因見鸞法師得生淨土，各率有緣，專修淨土之業；綽師又撰西方記驗，名《安樂集》流行。
translation: The Xihe Chanshi and others, seeing that the Luan Fashi had been born in the Pure Land, each led those with a purpose to focus on the Pure Land; the Chanshi also compiled a record of their experiences in the West, which became popular as the Annunciation Collection.

source_sentence: 又晉朝遠法師，入盧山三十年不出，乃命同志白黑有一百二十三人，立誓期於西方，鑿山銘願。
translation: The Jin Dynasty's Yuan Master of the Dharma entered Mt. Lu for thirty years without leaving, and then ordered his comrades, one hundred and twenty-three of whom were white and black, to make a vow to go to the West and dig a mountain for their inscription.

source_sentence: 至陳天嘉年，盧山珍禪師，於坐時見有數百餘人，共乘七寶華舫往西方，珍禪師遂求附載。
translation: When he arrived at the Chentian Carnival, the Chan Master Zhen of Lu Shan saw hundreds of people riding in a seven-jeweled flower boat to the west, and the Chan Master Zhen asked to be carried.

source_sentence: 其船上人報云：「法師雖講得《涅槃經》，亦大不可思議緣，法師未誦得《阿彌陀經》及呪，所以不得同去。」
translation: The people on board reported, "Even though the teacher had taught the Nirvana Sutra, it was an unfathomable condition, and the teacher hadn't recited the Amitâbha Sutra and its spell, so he couldn't go with them."

source_sentence: 法師遂廢講業，日夜專誦《彌陀經》及呪，計應滿二萬遍。
translation: The teacher then abandoned his lecturing duties and devoted himself day and night to reciting the Amitâbha Sutra and Dhāraṇī, which he expected to complete 20,000 times.

source_sentence: 未終四七日前，夜向四更，有神人從西方送一白銀臺來空中，明過於日，告云：「法師壽終，當乘此臺往生阿彌陀國，故來相示，令知定生。」
translation: About four or seven days before the end of his life, a god sent a silver dais into the sky at 4:00 p.m. It was brighter than the sun, and he told him, "The teacher will ride this dais to rebirth in Amitâbha when his life span ends, so he's here to show you that he's definitely going to be born."

source_sentence: 終時白黑咸聞，空中如奏音樂，并聞異香，數月聞香氣不歇。
translation: At the time of his death, both white and black were heard, as music played in the air, and a strange fragrance was heard for months without stopping.

source_sentence: 其夜峯頂寺僧眾，咸見一谷內有數十炬火大如車輪。
translation: That night, a group of monks from Vulture Peak Temple all saw dozens of torches in a valley on fire as large as a chariot wheel.

source_sentence: 尋驗古今，得生安樂世界者非一，多見化佛徒眾來迎靈瑞，如傳廣明，不可繁錄。
translation: Looking back through the past and present, there's not just one person who's been born in the world of paradise, but many of them have seen disciples of the transformation buddhas come to greet the spiritual auspicious event, as explained in the sutra, which cannot be repeatedly recorded.

source_sentence: 因珍禪師於此經有驗，故略述此一條以悟來哲，助成往生之志。
translation: Because Chan Master Zhen has experience with this sūtra, he has abbreviated this one in order to awaken future philosophers and help them fulfill their intention to be reborn.

source_sentence: 拔一切業障根本得生淨土神呪者，乃宋元嘉末年，求那跋陀重奉制譯，合計五十九字，一十五句。
translation: This is a translation of a spell that removes the root of all karmic hindrances and obtains birth in the Pure Land, which was prepared by Kunabhadra in the late Yuan and Jia years of the Song Dynasty, and contains fifty-nine words and fifteen phrases.

source_sentence: 龍樹菩薩願生安養，夢感此咒。
translation: The Nāgârjuna Bodhisattva wished to be born in paradise and had a dream in which he felt this mantra.

source_sentence: 耶舍三藏誦此呪，天平寺銹法師從耶舍三藏口受此呪，其人云：「經本外國不來，若欲受持呪法，嚼楊枝、澡豆，漱口、然香，於佛像前胡跪合掌，日夜六時各誦三七遍，即滅四重、五逆、十惡、謗方等罪，悉得滅除。
translation: The Tripiṭaka of Yaśas recited this spell, and the master of Tianping Temple received it from the mouth of the Tripiṭaka of Yaśas, who said, "The sūtra is not available in foreign countries, but if you want to memorize it, chew a poplar stick or a bathing bean, rinse your mouth, rinse it with incense, kneel down with your palms together in front of the Buddha's image, and recite it three or seven times each of the six hours of the day and night, that will extinguish the four grave sins, the five heinous crimes, the ten evils, and the denunciation of directions, and they will all be extinguished.

source_sentence: 現世所求皆得，不為惡鬼神所惑亂。
translation: Whatever he seeks in the present life, he'll attain it and won't be confused by evil spirits.

source_sentence: 若數滿二十萬遍，即感得菩提牙生，若至三十萬遍即面見阿彌陀佛。」
translation: If he recites it 200,000 times, then he'll attain the birth of a bodhi tooth, and if he recites it 300,000 times, then he'll see Amitâbha Buddha face to face."
